mapper.select: select tv.tv_no, tv.tv_tit, tv.tv_content, tv.tv_local, tv.tv_id, tv.tv_category, img.tv_no, img.img_no, img.m_img, img.sub_img1, img.sub_img2, img.sub_img3, img.sub_img4 from trip_tv tv inner join trip_img img on tv.tv_no = img.img_no where
mapper.insert: insert into trip_tv (tv_no, tv_tit, tv_ads, tv_content, tv_local, tv_id, tv_category, tv_price) values (seq_tv.nextval, #{title}, #{address}, #{content}, #{local}, #{localId}, #{localCategory}, #{price})
mapper.update: update trip_tv set tv_tit=#{title}, tv_content=#{content}, tv_price=#{price}, tv_local=#{local}, tv_id="#{localId}", tv_category=#{localCategory} updated_at = sysdate where tno = #{tno}
update trip_tv set user_count = #{count} where tno=#{tno}
mapper.select: select * from trip_tv order by user_count desc limit 4
